markdown: II. MARKET DYNAMICS • If not reversed, the effects of aging will result in a 22 share point gap between RJR and PM by 1995. Projected Effect of Aging <::line chart titled "Projected Effect of Aging" Y-axis: Values from 20 to 50. X-axis: "YEARS", with values 84, 86, 88, 90, 92, 94, 96. Two data series are plotted: 1. A line with diamond markers, starting at approximately (Year 85, Value 36) and increasing to (Year 95, Value 50). This series is labeled "PM 49.2" at its end point. 2. A line with square markers, starting at approximately (Year 85, Value 33) and decreasing to (Year 95, Value 27). This series is labeled "RJR 27.0" at its end point.::> 52138 5647
